Rgurobi
=======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which Rgurobi installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using Rgurobi, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load Rgurobi/9.5.0-foss-2021b-R-4.1.2
```
